just return it in the try {}
seems like the license comment style is different between the files.
Yes. I did that because I saw the same difference in the other hpp and cpp file for e.g. pcie_i2c.hpp and pcie_i2c.cpp. Would you suggest to use only one way ?

explicitly declare the variable type.

Also, I think we prefer enum class instead.

on wait, how it this set?


Need to add a meson_option for this.
I have set the flag in downstream recipe for our machine. I will point you to the review offline.
Done.. Added meson_option to accept the flag from EXTRA_OEMESON in bb recipe

should probably be `boolean`?

Also add a new line at the end.
I guess we can submit it for now to get started. I am fine with this change. Lots of change will be made soon.
add new line. Same with the other files.
I believe there are some header here that we can remove.
Done.. Also remove unwanted headers from other files in this change.
Thanks Willy, for the thorough review.
